title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 vs Galaxy Tab S8 Plus vs Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra: Explaining the differences in these flagship Android tablets
content:
Samsung’s new Galaxy S22 series may have grabbed most of the attention, but at the same Unpacked event, the South Korean tech giant also launched a trio of new tablets, including an “Ultra” model that is one of the largest tablets in the industry and blurs the line between tablet and laptop more than ever.

The post Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 vs Galaxy Tab S8 Plus vs Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra: Explaining the differences in these flagship Android tablets appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Interested in the Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 series? We break down all the differences between the regular, Plus, and Ultra for you
